TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/StartPanel/UserPane extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a for the top border of the **Start** menu. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPane.Normal%2A> property of the VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPane class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the top border of the **Start** menu.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPane.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelUserPane1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#214](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.v_48_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#214](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.v_48_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the top border of the **Start** menu.
Docs.value: A that represents the top border of the **Start** menu.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelUserPane1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#214](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/a013c730-13e9-40a7-b4ff-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#214](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/a013c730-13e9-40a7-b4ff-_1.vb)]
